items.summary: In the `initializeSeedData` function in `backend/main.mo`, perform an exhaustive search and removal of every event record associated with the Kulturzentrum Rostock event on Thu 5 Mar 2026 across ALL artist arrays — including Richie Hawtin, Juan Atkins, Joey Beltram, and any other artist. Do not rely on prior partial removals; re-audit the full hard-coded event list for every artist and confirm no event with venue 'Kulturzentrum', city 'Rostock', country 'Germany', or dateTime '2026-03-05T...' survives in any artist's event set. After removal, Richie Hawtin must have exactly one seeded event ('Detroit Love Day 1: Richie Hawtin - Carl Craig - Dennis Ferrer', TBA venue, Detroit, USA, '2026-02-27T22:00:00Z'). All other artist event datasets must remain unchanged. The `postupgrade` system hook must continue to call `initializeSeedData` unconditionally so the corrected data is present on every deploy.

In `frontend/src/lib/eventIdLookup.ts`, perform a thorough audit and remove every entry whose composite key could correspond to the Kulturzentrum Rostock event (Thu 5 Mar 2026, Rostock, Germany) regardless of which artist it is keyed under — including Richie Hawtin, Juan Atkins, and Joey Beltram. Search by dateTime nanoseconds corresponding to '2026-03-05T...' and by any city or venue string matching 'Rostock' or 'Kulturzentrum'. Ensure no stale lookup entry references this event ID.
